tit.cmt: 括弧内は削除しました。

sen.j: 四条河原町（しじょうかわらまち）は、京都府京都市下京区および中京区にまたがる交差点名である。
sen.e: Shijo Kawaramachi is the intersection name between Shomogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and Chukyo Ward.
Shijo Kawaramachi is the intersection name between Shomogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and Chukyo Ward.
Shijo Kawaramachi is the intersection name between Shimogyo Ward and Nakagyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 四条河原町は四条通と河原町通が交差している地点の交差点名である。
sen.e: Shijo Kawaramachi is the name of intersection where Shijo and Kawaramachi-dori Streets intertwine.
Shijo Kawaramachi is the name of the intersection where Shijo and Kawaramachi-dori Streets intertwine.
Shijo Kawaramachi is the name of the intersection where Shijo-dori and Kawaramachi-dori Streets intertwine.

sen.j: 四条河原町交差点周辺は京都市内はもとより、西日本でも有数の繁華街のひとつである。
sen.e: The area near the Sijokawaramachi Intersection is one of the prominent busy streets in Western Japan.
The area near the Sijokawaramachi Intersection is one of the more prominent busy streets in Western Japan.
The area near the Shijo Kawaramachi Intersection is one of the most prominent busy streets not only in Kyoto City, but in Western Japan.

sen.j: 四条河原町から四条烏丸までの四条通、四条河原町から河原町三条までの河原町通や、四条通から御池通までの寺町通・新京極通は一体化した繁華街となっている。
sen.e: Shijo Street from Shijo Kawaramachi to Shijo Karasuma, Kawaramachi Street from Shijo Kawaramachi to Kawaramachi Sanjo, Teramachi and Shinkyogoku Streets from Shijo to Oike Streets are combined together as the busy downtown street.

Shijo Street from Shijo Kawaramachi to Shijo Karasuma, Kawaramachi Street from Shijo Kawaramachi to Kawaramachi Sanjo, Teramachi and Shinkyogoku Streets from Shijo to Oike Streets combine together to form a busy downtown street.

Shijo-dori Street from Shijo Kawaramachi to Shijo Karasuma, Kawaramachi-dori Street from Shijo Kawaramachi to Kawaramachi Sanjo, Teramachi-dori and Shinkyogoku-dori Streets from Shijo-dori Street to Oike-dori Street combine together to form a busy downtown street.
sen.cmt: 通り名を修正しました。

sen.j: 四条河原町交差点の直下には地下駅の阪急電鉄阪急京都本線河原町駅 (京都府)があり、地下で阪急百貨店や高島屋と直結している。
sen.e: There is a subway Kawaramachi Station (Kyoto Prefecture), Hankyu Corporation Hankyu Kyoto Mainline, Hanyu Railway directly below the Shijo Kawaramachi Intersection, and is directly connected to Hankyu Hanshin Department Store and Takashimaya Department Store by underground path.

There is a subway Kawaramachi Station (Kyoto Prefecture), Hankyu Corporation Hankyu Kyoto Mainline, Hanyu Railway directly below the Shijo Kawaramachi Intersection, and is directly connected to Hankyu Hanshin Department Store and Takashimaya Department Store by underground path.

There is a subway Kawaramachi Station (Kyoto Prefecture) of the Hankyu Corporation's Hankyu Kyoto Main Line below the Shijo Kawaramachi Intersection, and is directly connected to Hankyu Hanshin Department Store and Takashimaya Department Store by underground passage.
sen.cmt: 一部電車の表現を修正しました。

sen.j: また2007年10月には、四条河原町交差点北東角に阪急電鉄が開発する商業ビル・コトクロス阪急河原町（ブックファーストなどが入居）が新たにオープンし、こちらも地下で河原町駅に直結する。
sen.e: The commercial building Kotocross Hankyu Kawaramachi (Book First has its store there) was newly opened at the eastern corner of Shijo Kawaramachi intersection in October 2007 and is directly connected to Kawaramachi Station by an underground passage.

The commercial building Kotocross Hankyu Kawaramachi (Book First has its store there) was newly opened at the eastern corner of Shijo Kawaramachi intersection in October 2007 and is directly connected to Kawaramachi Station by an underground passage.

The commercial building Kotocross Hankyu Kawaramachi (Book First has its store there) was newly opened at the eastern corner of Shijo Kawaramachi Intersection in October 2007 and is directly connected to Kawaramachi Station by an underground passage.
sen.cmt: Intersection 大文字にしました。

sen.j: 京阪電気鉄道京阪本線四条駅 (京阪)へは地下通路こそつながっていないが、鴨川 (淀川水系)に掛かる四条大橋を渡ってすぐであり、京阪沿線へのアクセスも良い。
sen.e: Shijo Station of Keihan mainline, Keihan Electric Railway is not connected by the underground passage, but it is located just after crossing Shijoohashi Bridge (Shijo Great Bridge) across Kamo River (Yodo River system), and is easily accessible to Keihan lines.

Shijo Station of Keihan mainline, Keihan Electric Railway is not connected by the underground passage, but it is located just after crossing Shijoohashi Bridge (Shijo Great Bridge) across Kamo River (Yodo River system), and is easily accessible by Keihan lines.

Shijo Station of Keihan Main Line, Keihan Electric Railway is not connected by the underground passage, but it is located just after crossing Shijo-ohashi Bridge across the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system), and is easily accessible by Keihan lines.
sen.cmt: 鉄道表現など修正しました。"the" を適宜追加しました。

sen.j: 京阪四条駅の向こうには祇園があり、そこまでは徒歩圏内である。
sen.e: There is Gion beyond Keihan Shijo Station and is accessible by foot.
There is Gion beyond Keihan Shijo Station and is accessible by foot.
There is Gion beyond Keihan Shijo Station and is accessible by foot.

sen.j: 一方、西日本旅客鉄道や東海旅客鉄道、近畿日本鉄道が乗り入れる京都駅との間を直結する鉄道はなく、バスを利用するか京都市営地下鉄烏丸線と阪急京都線を乗り継ぐ必要がある。
sen.e: On the other hand, there is no connecting rail to Kyoto station where West Japan Railway Company (JR West), Central Japan Railway Company (JR Central), or Kinki Nippon Railway Company (Kintetsu Railway) are running, and there is a need to ride a bus or use Karasuma Line, Kyoto City Subway and Hankyu Kyoto Line.

On the other hand, there is no connecting rail to Kyoto station where West Japan Railway Company (JR West), Central Japan Railway Company (JR Central), or Kinki Nippon Railway Company (Kintetsu Railway) are running, and there is a need to ride a bus or use Karasuma Line, Kyoto City Subway and Hankyu Kyoto Line.

On the other hand, there is no connecting rail to Kyoto station where West Japan Railway Company (JR West), Central Japan Railway Company (JR Central), or Kinki Nippon Railway Company (Kintetsu Railway) are running, and there is a need to ride a bus or use Karasuma Line, Kyoto Municipal Subway and Hankyu Kyoto Line.

tit.cmt: 小タイトル用に小文字に修正しました。

sen.cmt: ハイフンを追加しました。
左記のようにしました。

sen.j: 阪急電鉄阪急京都本線河原町駅 (京都府)

sen.j: 山科区、醍醐駅 (京都府)方面行
